# Teoman Metehan

> AI Strategist, Serial Entrepreneur, and PhD Researcher

## About
Teoman Metehan is the Founder & CEO of TVI Teknoloji, a Turkish technology company building AI-powered B2B SaaS solutions. With 25+ years of business experience, he has successfully founded and scaled multiple ventures including Sehrikeyif.com (400K+ users, $7M revenue).

## Current Focus
- Building AI-powered B2B SaaS products (Vizitmor, BulunAI, MüşterimAI, KolayPost, NiyetAI)
- PhD research on AI recommendation systems vs human decision-making
- Thought leadership in AI adoption for Turkish SMEs

## Background
- Education: Boğaziçi University (BSc, MSc), University of Maine (MBA), Istanbul Okan University (PhD Candidate)
- Experience: Siemens, Teknik Yapı, Doğan Holding, founder of multiple startups

## Contact
- Website: https://teomanmetehan.com
- Company: https://tvi.com.tr
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/teoman-metehan-a365773
